channel.title: The random default names
channel.description: Anybody find it much easier to win, when you don't make your own name? I feel I'm more drawn to unique names when I'm investigating or attacking. And I also feel I get wayyyy further in the game when I'm a default name. Anybody else think the same thing?

item.title: The random default names
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
night 1 I do tend to kill people who have names of charachters I don’t like or people with names that are offensive in some way or if there is a theme I might kill those of first.

Read full topic

item.title: The random default names
item.dc:creator: CN73DRUMMER
item.description:
Killed n1 with a random default name. Disregard this post.

Read full topic
